channel.title: Private Endpoints on IGDB.com API Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Private Endpoints on IGDB.com API Documentation

item.title: Authentication
item.description: You must apply for a Client ID and Client Secret from us manually. There is no automated system for this. Please send an email to sitefeedback@igdb.se explaining and linking to information about your app, the scopes you require, why you require those scopes and finally, the oAuth callback url. Authentication is done using the oAuth2 workflow. oAuth Details Authentication URL: https://www.igdb.com/oauth/authorize Authentication URL (mobile): https://m.igdb.com/oauth/authorize Token URL: https://www.igdb.com/oauth/token.json Scope: public Other scopes are described in other pages within the private endpoints section.

item.title: List Entries
item.description: URL path: /private/list_entries/ Scope Name lists Description: IGDB list entries This information is only accessible after a user has authenticated and you have an access token. Any reads or writes performed will be specifically to that user. Example response { "id": 157609, "user": 1337, "list": 7331, "game": 1942, "position": 0 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + user unsigned 64-bit integer + User ID list unsigned 64-bit integer + List ID game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of Game that the entry is reffering to position 64-bit integer + position of the entry in the list, 0: default Usage

item.title: Lists
item.description: URL path: /private/lists/ Scope Name lists Description: IGDB user lists This information is only accessible after a user has authenticated and you have an access token. Any reads or writes performed will be specifically to that user. Example response { "id": 7331, "name": "Want to Play", "slug": "want-to-play", "updated_at": 1515406241367, "created_at": 1484834920172, "user": 1337, "url": "https://www.igdb.com/users/1337/lists/want-to-play", "private": false, "numbering": false, "count": 34, "lists": [ 16717, 9581, 20268, 20765, 17883 ] } Fields

item.title: Play Times
item.description: Getting detailed play times for a user URL path: /private/play_times/ Scope Name play_times Description: IGDB Play Times This information is only accessible after a user has authenticated and you have an access token. Any reads or writes performed will be specifically to that user. Example response [ { "id": 5253, "created_at": 1519380959, "game": 5343, "user": 24223, "client_id": "fsf34fw4w4wferevxaaaf34wr", "start_time": 15192843993, "end_time": 1519380959, "duration": 1 } ] Fields

item.title: Ratings
item.description: URL path: /private/rates/ Scope Name rates Description: IGDB user ratings This information is only accessible after a user has authenticated and you have an access token. Any reads or writes performed will be specifically to that user. Example response { "id": 156849, "user": 1337, "game": 1942, "rating": 9 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + user unsigned 64-bit integer + User ID game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Game that the user has rated rating unsigned 64-bit integer + The rating value for the specific game, 0 - 10 Usage

item.title: Reviews
item.description: URL path: /private/reviews/ Scope Name reviews Description: IGDB user reviews This information is only accessible after a user has authenticated and you have an access token. Any reads or writes performed will be specifically to that user. Example response { "id": 2508, "slug": "review-monster-hunter-world", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/games/monster-hunter-world/reviews/review-monster-hunter-world", "updated_at": 1519396825587, "created_at": 1519396825579, "game": 36926, "username": "1337", "title": "Review: Monster Hunter: World", "avatar_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/yvk53qfbt3vwjz2iwevw.png", "likes": 0, "views": 0, "rating_category": 2, "review_rating": 6, "content": "Here is the user review, a minimum of 50 characters.
